entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 31 with temperature rising to minus 21 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming south 20 late this evening. Low minus 31 with temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. Wind chill minus 44 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow and local blowing snow beginning in the morning. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then clearing. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
